text: Brazil's President Jair Bolsonaro removes his face mask before leaving a press conference in Brasilia's Alvorada Palace, after he announced in a press conference that he tested positive for COVID-19.  Full story: https://t.co/7Ezo70knIA https://t.co/crXnfe1o9j
